name: Pumpkin Pandemonium
description:
Info

Pumpkin Pandemonium is a 2D Platforming game where waves of enemies swarm the screen as the player must dodge on a single scarce life.

The game includes both the optional theme and optional colour palette “Cozy Autumn”.

Game

A humble farmer returns to his cozy barn for the night. Until an incantation is bestowed upon his pumpkin patch! The pumpkins begin to bound across the barn as the farmer must dodge until the bewitching side-effects of the curse wear off.

Instructions

Left and right arrow keys for moving back and forth. Up arrow key to jump. Left Shift for the roll ability. You can also quickly press the left and right arrows while in mid-air to perform the ‘Hat Glide’ to increase your air time.

Credits

MaxR_Dev - Programming and Art

HenkkaStorm - Music and SFX

The Wonderful Firth Team for Hosting the Jam!
